mapper.update: update notice_board set bhit=bhit+1 where bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from notice_board where btitle like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by bGroup desc, bStep asc) a) where rnum>=#{startrow} and rnum<=#{endrow}
select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from notice_board where bcontent like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by bGroup desc, bStep asc) a) where rnum>=#{startrow} and rnum<=#{endrow}

select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from notice_board where bcontent like '%'||#{search}||'%' or bTitle like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by bGroup desc, bStep asc) a) where rnum>=#{startrow} and rnum<=#{endrow}
select count(*) from notice_board where btitle like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select count(*) from notice_board where bcontent like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select count(*) from notice_board where bcontent like '%'||#{search}||'%' or btitle like '%'||#{search}||'%'
